properties.name:
Plans of Parts of Piermont, Sparkill, and Palisades, 
N.Y. and Harrington, N.J.
properties.description:
from Atlas of the Hudson River Valley from New York city  
to Troy, including a section of about 8 miles in width. Published by Watson &   
co. Compiled from official records and careful surveys, under the supervision of
F. W. Beers.
